title: What features will be available in 5G other than quality and high data speed and how is 5G related to IoT? - Quora

response.answer_text: The following are the key features of 5G (People call this as “8 currencies of 5G”… as these features help service providers to monetise 5G better). 5G helps IOT as it is expected to be more “energy efficient”. It would significantly reduce the battery consumption in IOT devices. Also, 5G is suitable for IOT as it supports low latencies and high throughput. Given the broad spectrum range that 5G supports, it enables IOT devices of varying data transfer requirements - to latch on to the network. Peak Data Rate (10 Gbps) Mobile data volume (10 Tb/s/Km2) Mobility - 500 Km/hr Connected Devices - 1M / Km2 Service Deployment (90 minutes) Reliability (99.999%) Energy Efficiency (10% of current consumption) E2E Latency (5 milliseconds)
